description: If we enabled "AggregateInstanceExtraSpecsFilter" in scheduler or other filters related to the extra specs of flavor, and issue live-migration without giving a destination host, the scheduler will always bypass the filters.
title: live-migration miss instance_extra_specs related filters

comments.content: If we enabled "AggregateInstanceExtraSpecsFilter" in scheduler or other filters related to the extra specs of flavor, and issue live-migration without giving a destination host, the scheduler will always bypass the filters.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nuaafe

comments.content:
